sentences.sContent: Among which, separating degree and repeatability are more practical parameters in system applicability test.
sentences.sContent_eng: Among which, separating degree and repeatability are more practical parameters in system applicability test.
sentences.sCn: 其中，分离度和重复性是系统适用性试验中更具实用意义的参数。

sentences.sContent: We have no evidence at all to confirm or contradict the applicability of thermodynamics to the universe as a whole.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have no evidence at all to confirm or contradict the applicability of thermodynamics to the universe as a whole.
sentences.sCn: 我们还毫无证据足以肯定或否定热力学在整个宇宙中的适用性。

sentences.sContent: Every federal agency must publish all substantive rules or statements of general applicability adopted by the agency.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every federal agency must publish all substantive rules or statements of general applicability adopted by the agency.
sentences.sCn: 每个联邦机构必须公布机构所采取的所有实质性规则或总体适用性的陈述。

remMethod.val: 来自apply(v. 应用， 适用)

words.tran: 可适用的；可应用的；合适的
适用的；有用的；可应用的
